lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have always been very fortunate, but I have come to a point in my life recently that has taught me how lucky I am and how hard it is for others who haven't been as lucky. I have been working very hard remodeling my house by myself so I can sell it for a profit, and as a result, I come home from work and work some more.  I have also accumulated lots of debt from buying materials for my home.  I am lucky because I know that I will be able to pay off my debt as soon as I sell my house, but right now I am experiencing a time of financial crisis and long hours.  NOW I finally understand the struggle of hard work and little money, and I would like to help out other who have even less than I do, even if it means adding a little to my own debt.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find the information they need for free - medical, legal, financial, employment... anything they need.  I help people do research. Hydroponics is a system to grow big fat plants, vegetables, fruits & flowers. Hydroponic is an organic gardening system to grow plants with rich nutrients. The nutrient is fed to the plant to get high valued and high yielding crops throughout the year.

website that gives you free, exclusive information for high-yielding, high quality hydroponics, Nutrients and Your crops will grow faster, flower faster, and yield more. Hydroponics Growers discover how to grow big fat juicy buds the size of your arms, guaranteed. Get Connoisseur, the world's newest, most potent, ultra-premium, two-part bloom phase fertilizer. And check out Nirvana, our all-new organic bloom booster. You'll see bigger, heavier, tastier harvests right away.

Hydroponics can be used for large scale agriculture and right in your homes as well if you plan to have a little garden for yourself. This technique has several other advantages like less labour and garden maintenance, pests and diseases are easily avoided as the climate can be controlled, plants are free from weeds and will thus grow healthy ensuring that we get good, wholesome and non-toxic food on our table. For more info visit our Website http://www.advancednutrients.com.

lenders.name: AZmovingPros
lenders.occupational_info:
Looking for a quality, trusted moving company?  With our  moving experience, you can be sure your belongings are in good hands. 

At AZmovingPro's we specialize in local and long distance relocation. We can save you up to 25% when compared with the national moving companies. We can offer an excellent rate to match your moving budget.
Our goal is to provide you with useful information about our company that we hope makes it easier for you to do business with us.

lenders.name: KEEN
lenders.occupation: Maker of shoes, bags and socks
lenders.loan_because: KEEN will provide loans to aspiring Entrepreneurs around the world in order to change lives and strengthen communities. When the loan is repaid, the money will be invested to continue the cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: Founded in 2003, KEEN was first recognized for its Newport sandal, which featured patented toe protection technology. Our company strives to demonstrate integrity and leadership, especially on social and environmental commitments, while promoting an inclusive outdoors community. Through its giving program Hybrid.Care, the company provides support to a variety of social and environmental organizations around the globe. Based in Portland, Oregon, our products are available in more than 5,000 retail locations in more than 50 countries.
